name: Katzul - The warrior lineage
description: - First person shooter. Roguelite. - In the ancient kingdom of Xephyr, there lived a noble family of warriors known as the Katzul. However, when a new leader takes control and accuses the Katzul of treason, they are banished. Over time, the Katzul descendants continue their quest to reclaim their honor and throne by battling against the army controlled by the wicked leader of the usurpation, who possesses the mighty gem known as the Eye of Xivis. Join this thrilling adventure and become the hero of the Katzul as you restore justice and honor to your family.
